name: Cults of Praywood
description:
Cult of Praywoods is a project developed by our students during the 2020/21 academic year for The Big One project in collaboration with 34BigThings.

DESCRIPTION

Praywood is a little city formed in a puddle in the middle of the woods.

The inhabitants of this strange city are berry-like creatures that constantly struggle to expand the influence of their favourite divinity.

Which divinity will you incarnate? How will you use your strong abilities? Raise your cult and conquer the hearts of Praywood!

CoP is a real-time strategy game for PC, developed in collaboration with 34BigThings.

The core concept of the game is an experience of cooperation and competition: there are two teams, allied players need to collaborate, but only one player among all will be the winner.

CONTROLS

Select..............................................Left Mouse Button

Cancel.............................................Right Mouse Button

Change number of cultists.............Mouse Wheel / Keyboard Numbers (1-9)

Open Menu / Back.........................Esc

Open/Close chat............................Enter
